attributes.action: Brits already in status altered green list countries to be exempt from isolating
attributes.additional_details: Because this is not fair to the public who travelled to green list countries, people who are spending their well earned money to keep the aviation industry and holiday industry alive. It causes massive amounts of stress and chaos and also creates issues at their places of work!
attributes.background: Should a green or amber list country suddenly have it's status change, those already there should not have to isolate on return nor rush back home, creating chaos.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582710
